description:
http://anidb.net/ch7246 [Kagome] leads a fairly normal life, in spite of her weird family. Her house is a thousand-year-old Japanese temple, and her grandfather talks about the history of the house endlessly. Legend has it that the old well on the temple grounds keeps a vicious ancient monster at bay; Kagome never believed those legends, until now. The well opens up and sucked Kagome inside transporting her to an ancient time of enchanted forests and giant demons.
Kagome is soon confronted by her odd resemblance to http://anidb.net/ch10909 [Kikyou], the girl who controlled the magical Shikon no Tama talisman and imprisoned the legendary half-demon http://anidb.net/ch7245 [InuYasha]. Upon entering this fantasy world, Kagome is attacked by a demon hunting the Shikon no Tama; she unwittingly releases InuYasha from his imprisonment, only to find that he`s no hero.

REGULAR.description:
In feudal Japan, the half demon Inuyasha was sealed away by the priestess Kikyo. Many years later he is revived by Kagome, who has slipped through time from the present day. Kagome is surprised when the sacred Shikon Jewel, which makes demons stronger, emerges from a cut on her body.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Garota que Volta no Tempo e o Garoto Lacrado
Jidai o Koeta Shoujo to Fuuinsareta Shounen
La joven que cruzó la barrera del tiempo
The Girl Who Overcame Time... and the Boy Who Was Just Overcome
เด็กสาวผู้ข้าวเวลากับเด็กหนุ่มที่ถูกผนึก
時代を越えた少女と封印された少年

REGULAR.description:
Kagome finds out that she may be the reincarnation of Kaede`s late older sister, the priestess Kikyo, who sealed Inuyasha with her arrow. The Carrion Crow demon is after the Shikon Jewel and kidnaps Kagome, but Inuyasha shows up to save her. After Kagome defeats the Carrion Crow with an arrow, the Shikon Jewel shatters into pieces.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: As pessoas atrás da Jóia de Quatro Almas
Seres en busca de la perla de las cuatro almas
Shikon no Tama o Nerau Mono-tachi
四魂の玉を狙う者たち

REGULAR.description:
Kagome has the ability to see pieces of the Shikon Jewel. Inuyasha has the power to defeat demons. Both of their powers are needed to gather the shards of the jewel that were scattered, but the two don`t get along. The demon Yura, who is after the jewel, manipulates villagers to attack Inuyasha.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Down the Rabbit Hole and Back Again
Hone Kui no Ido kara Tadaima!
骨喰いの井戸からただいまっ!

REGULAR.description:
Kagome has returned to the present day and is relaxing in her home when Inuyasha comes looking for her. Some of Yura`s demonic hair is on his body. Kagome and Inuyasha return to feudal Japan to exterminate the Yura of the hair.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yura, el demonio de los cabellos

REGULAR.description:
Kagome learns that Inuyasha is a half demon, born of a human mother and a dog demon. Inuyasha`s half brother Sesshomaru appears, looking for the tomb of their father. In order to manipulate Inuyasha, he brings Inuyasha`s dead human mother with him. But the woman turns out to be a demon known as a muonna.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 戦慄の貴公子 殺生丸

REGULAR.description:
The muonna makes Inuyasha reveal the location of his father`s grave. Sesshomaru removes Inuyasha`s right eye (the black pearl) and opens the entrance to the grave. Kagome is angered by Sesshomaru`s cruelty. She goes with Inuyasha after Sesshomaru. Inside their father`s tomb is a memento of Inuyasha`s father, the sword Tetsusaiga.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La misteriosa espada Colmillo de Acero
Tessaiga: o canino de aço destruidor
不気味な妖刀 鉄砕牙

REGULAR.description:
Kagome is able to pull out the Tetsusaiga. Sesshomaru tries to kill her, and Inuyasha is angered and fights to protect Kagome. His will to protect a human changes the Tetsusaiga into its true form, a fang sword.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sesshomaru contra el Colmillo de Acero
激対決! 殺生丸VS鉄砕牙!!

REGULAR.description:
In the Kai Province, there is a young samurai named Nobunaga. He is a clumsy but earnest young man. He has heard rumors about the man that the the princess, his childhood friend, has married. Nobunaga tries to save the lord of the castle who is possessed by a toad demon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Senhor Feudal youkai: Sapo de tsukumo
The Toad Who Would Be Prince
殿様妖怪 九十九の蝦蟇

REGULAR.description:
Shippo is a demon fox whose father was killed by the the Thunder Brothers: Hiten and Manten. He steals the Shikon Jewel shards from Kagome so that he can avenge his father.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El Pequeño Shippo y los hermanos relámpago
Entra em cena Shippou!; Os irmãos youkai relâmpago Hitten e Manten
Shippou Toujou! Raijuu Kyoudai Hiten Manten!!
七宝登場! 雷獣兄弟 飛天満天!!

REGULAR.description:
Inuyasha goes to save Kagome from Manten. Hiten devours the sacred jewel shard that Manten had and absorbs his demon powers. Hiten attacks Inuyasha with his Raigekijin. Inuyasha is in trouble and defends himself with the scabbard of the Tetsusaiga.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Confronto da espada: relâmpago contra Tesaiga
La espada Relámpago contra el Colmillo de Acero
Phantom Showdown - The Thunder Brothers vs. Tetsusaiga
妖刀激突! 雷撃刃VS鉄砕牙!!

REGULAR.description:
Kagome has returned to the present day to take a test. As she does, a noh mask, the Mask of Flesh, begins a violent search for the Shikon Jewel shards. Kagome`s younger brother, Sota, tries hard to call Inuyasha to come to Kagome`s rescue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A máscara da maldição que ressuscita na época actual
Gendai ni Yomigaeru Noroi no Noumen
Terror of the Ancient Noh Mask
現代によみがえる呪いの能面

REGULAR.description:
Kagome sees a Soul Piper, a demon that consoles the spirits of children. She helps Mayu, a girl who is about to become an evil spirit, to pass on.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tatarimoke e o pequeno espírito mau
The Soul Piper and the Mischievous Little Soul
タタリモッケと小さな悪霊

REGULAR.description:
Half demon Inuyasha`s secret is that he becomes human once a month. That day, Inuyasha and the gang meet Nazuna and stay at a mountain temple. They fall into Kumogashira`s trap and the sacred jewel shards are taken away from them. Inuyasha is injected with poison!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El misterio de la Luna Nueva
O segredo do primeiro dia: Inuyasha de cabelos pretos
Shingetsu no Nazo Kurokami no Inuyasha
The Mystery of the New Moon and the Black-Haired Inuyasha
新月の謎 黒髪の犬夜叉

REGULAR.description:
The ogress, Urasue, robs the grave of Kikyo, the priestess who sealed away Inuyasha fifty years ago. She revives Kikyo`s body using the ashes of Kikyo`s bones and soil from Kikyo`s grave. But Kikyo`s soul has already been reincarnated in a different body.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Los restos de Kikyo son robados
O roubo dos ossos sagrados da Kikyou

REGULAR.description:
Kikyo is revived when Kagome`s soul flows into her. She tries to kill Inuyasha, but Kagome takes back her soul. Fifty years ago, Kikyo wanted Inuyasha to use the Shikon Jewel to become human. But on the day of their promise, someone who looked like Inuyasha fatally injured Kikyo. Inuyasha realizes that there is a mysterious person who made them fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: O renascimento da infeliz sacerdotisa Kikyou
Return of the Tragic Priestess, Kikyo
悲運の巫女 桔梗復活

REGULAR.description:
Miroku, a womanizing delinquent priest, has been collecting Shikon Jewel shards and steals Kagome`s shards. Inuyasha tracks him down and confronts Miroku to get the shards back. Miroku fights back with his priestly powers and the wind tunnel in his hand that he was cursed with.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Migite ni Kazaana Furyou Houshi Miroku
Mystical Hand of the Amorous Monk, Miroku
O buraco do vento na mão direita: Miroku, o monge delinquente
右手に風穴 不良法師 弥勒

REGULAR.description:
Kotatsu, a painter, sees a dream in which he becomes successful by controlling an army of ogres drawn with ink that has a sacred jewel shard in it. Miroku, Inuyasha and the others become involved in protecting the princess that Kotatsu is in love with.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A tinta corrompida do pintor do Inferno
The Cursed Ink of the Hell-Painter

REGULAR.description:
Naraku appears before Sesshomaru and lends him an arm with a sacred jewel shard embedded in it. Sesshomaru attaches the arm to himself and appears before Inuyasha and the gang to steal the Tetsusaiga.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A aliança de Naraku e Sesshoumaru
Te o Kunda Naraku to Sesshoumaru
手を組んだ奈落と殺生丸

REGULAR.description:
Sesshomaru wields the Tetsusaiga with his borrowed arm against Inuyasha, who fights back with his scabbard. When the two strike each other at the same time, Inuyasha gets up close to Sesshomaru, rips off his arm, and gets back the Tetsusaiga. When Inuyasha learns Naraku`s plan, he fears that Kagome might die.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Go Home to Your Own Time, Kagome!
Kaere, Kagome! Omae no Jidai ni
Volte para a sua era, Kagome!
帰れ, かごめ! お前の時代に

REGULAR.description:
Kagome has her sacred jewel shards taken away from her and is returned to the present day, unable to return to feudal Japan. Back to her normal life, she agrees to go on a date with Hojo. Meanwhile, Inuyasha and the gang try to find out more about the mysterious Naraku.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Despicable Villain! The Mystery of Onigumo
O enigma de Onigumo, o ladrão diabólico
あさましき野盗 鬼蜘蛛の謎

REGULAR.description:
Kagome returns to the shrine in the middle of her date with Hojo. She senses the presence of the Shikon Jewel shards and returns to feudal Japan. Naraku reveals that fifty years ago, Onigumo was in love with Kikyo. The demons that were drawn to Onigumo by his malice devoured Onigumo, and the demon Naraku was born.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 50 Nen Mae no Shinjutsu Naraku no Shoutai
50年前の真実 奈落の正体
A verdade sobre a origem de Naraku; A alma de Kikyou (Parte 1)
La vérité sur Naraku et l`âme de Kikyo (I)

REGULAR.description:
Kikyo, who was brought back to life, is living as a priestess. A monk, who realizes that Kikyo is dead, tries to make Kikyo pass on, but Kikyo ends up killing him. Inuyasha saves the monk`s disciples and runs to Kikyo when he hears the priestess`s name.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Wicked Smile; Kikyo`s Wandering Soul
A verdade sobre a origem de Naraku; A alma de Kikyou (Parte 2)
Ashiki Bishou Samayou Kikyou no Tamashii
La vérité sur Naraku et l`âme de Kikyo (II)
Una sonrisa perversa; el alma errante de Kikyo
悪しき微笑さまよう桔梗の魂

REGULAR.description:
Kikyo paralyzes Kagome. Inuyasha appears before her. Kikyo has been gathering the souls of dead girls. She vents her grudge against Inuyasha. Inuyasha reveals that he has never forgotten her. When Inuyasha kisses Kikyo, Kikyo tries to drag him to hell. But Inuyasha hears Kagome`s voice and regains consciousness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A voz de Kagome e o beijo de Kikyou
Kagome no Koe to Kikyou no Kuchizuke
La voz de Aome y el beso de Kikyo
かごめの声と桔梗の口づけ

REGULAR.description:
Sango, a demon slayer, is invited to Hitomi Castle along with her father, the leader of the demon slayers, and her younger brother, Kohaku. But it is a trap. Meanwhile, the undefended village is attacked by a horde of demons and annihilated. Naraku takes the Shikon Jewel shards that they had been gathering and leaves.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 妖怪退治屋 珊瑚登場!

REGULAR.description:
Sango fights Inuyasha, believing him to be her enemy. Naraku`s plan is to have her fight to the death using the power of the Shikon Jewel shard. But Sango listens to Kagome and is no longer suspicious of Inuyasha.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 奈落の謀略をうち破れ!

REGULAR.description:
Sango reveals the secret story of the Shikon Jewel`s birth. Midoriko, a priestess with powerful spiritual powers, fused with many demons after a battle to the death. She absorbed the souls of the demons into her own, punched out her soul, and died. Her soul is the Shikon Jewel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Geheimnis des "Juwels der vier Seelen"
Le secret de la perle de Shikon
O segredo da Jóia de Quatro Almas é finalmente revelado
The Secret of the Sacred Jewel Revealed!
Tsui ni Akasareta Shikon no Himitsu
ついに明かされた四魂の秘密

REGULAR.description:
Inuyasha and the gang meet Taromaru, the son of a village leader. They go to the Temple of the Water God, where children are being sacrificed. The Water God has a sacred treasure and toys around with the group.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le lac des ténèbres gouverné par le dieu de l`eau
O Lago da Escuridão controlado pelo Deus da Água
Suijin ga Shihai Suru Yami no Mizuumi
The Lake of the Evil Water God
水神が支配する闇の湖

REGULAR.description:
A demon injures Miroku`s Wind Tunnel. Miroku visits the temple of Mushin, the man who raised him, for help treating the injury. Mushin is possessed by an Urn Grub and attacks Miroku. Furthermore, Miroku is paralyzed and is surrounded by many demons.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kakoku na Wana ni Kakatta Miroku
Miroku Falls Into A Dangerous Trap!
Miroku cae en una cruel trampa
Miroku tombe dans un terrible piège
過酷な罠にかかった弥勒

REGULAR.description:
Sango`s younger brother, Kohaku, who`s supposed to be dead, is alive. Naraku reveals that Kohaku is living because of a sacred jewel shard that is planted in his back.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A angústia de Sango e a vida de Kohaku
El sufrimiento de Sango y la vida de Kohaku
La souffrance de Sango et la vie de Kohaku
Sango no Kunou to Kohaku no Inochi
珊瑚の苦悩と琥珀の命

REGULAR.description:
Sango steals the Tetsusaiga and is led to Naraku`s castle. Sango tries to use the opportunity to kill Naraku, but she is seriously injured by an attack from Kohaku. Inuyasha and the gang catch up to her, but they are in danger from Naraku`s miasma.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Tessaiga roubada e o confronto no castelo de Naraku
El robo del colmillo de acero
Nusumareta Tessaiga Taiketsu Naraku no Shiro!
Tetsusaiga is Stolen! Showdown at Naraku`s Castle
盗まれた鉄砕牙対決 奈落の城!

REGULAR.description:
Kirara has been weakened by Naraku`s poison. Inuyasha and Kagome go looking for an antidotal herb. Jinenji, a demon who is protecting an herb field, is actually a half demon and is picked on by the villagers because of his weakness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jinenji, o youkai bondoso e solitário
心優しき哀愁の地念児

REGULAR.description:
Inuyasha and Miroku come across a cave when they go looking for the source of a strong evil presence. The Fuko no Jutsu has been placed on the cave. Hundreds of demons will fight to the death and are absorbed by the victors.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jaki ni Ochita Kikyou to Inuyasha
Kikyo et Inu Yasha ont un problème
Kikyou e Inuyasha atraídos pelo Miasma
邪気に落ちた桔梗と犬夜叉

REGULAR.description:
Inuyasha and the gang go to save Kikyo. They are struck with Death by Illusion, a demon technique. Kagome is not affected by the technique. Kikyo takes away her Shikon Jewel shards and tries to kill her…
Source: crunchyroll

The Tenseiga and the Tetsusaiga, two great swords that were forged by swordsmith Totosai, have been left to Sesshomaru and Inuyasha by their father. Sesshomaru wants a sword to fight with and is unsatisfied with the Tenseiga, a healing sword.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Colmillo de Acero y Colmillo Sagrado

REGULAR.description:
Inuyasha`s eye is closed by poison from Sesshomaru`s claws. He relies on the smell of demon energies clashing to find the wind scar. He releases his sword`s true power and forces Sesshomaru to withdraw. Totosai accepts Inuyasha as Tetsusaiga`s owner.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A célebre espada escolhe o seu verdadeiro mestre
La espada elige a su verdadero dueño
Le véritable propriétaire du fabuleux sabre
Meitou ga Erabu Shin no Tsukaite
The True Owner of the Great Sword
名刀が選ぶ真の使い手

REGULAR.description:
Koga is the young leader of the demon wolf tribe, whose wolf minions were killed by Inuyasha. He places Shikon Jewel shards in his arms and legs, which he uses as weapons, making him an even match with Inuyasha. But it`s Kagome who intrigues him…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kagome Kidnapped by Koga, the Wolf-Demon
Kagome Ryakudatsu! Chousoku no Yourou Kouga
Le démon-loup Koga a kidnappé Kagome
O rapto de Kagome; Kouga, o youkai lobo super-veloz
かごめ略奪! 超速の妖狼 鋼牙

REGULAR.description:
Koga and the demon wolf tribe begin their attack on the Birds of Paradise. Kagome senses that the sacred jewel shard is in the mouth of the brothers who lead the Birds of Paradise and tells Koga. Koga and the Bird of Paradise brothers fight for each other`s shards.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Celui qui est amoureux de Kagome
El chico que se enamoró de Aome
O youkai que se apaixonou por Kagome
The Man Who Fell In Love With Kagome
かごめに惚れたあいつ

REGULAR.description:
Kagome is angry that Inuyasha is suspicious of her relationship with Koga and returns to the present day. She goes back to school for the first time in a while, where she has to deal with the advances of yet another suitor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Loin des yeux mais près du cœur
Separados, os dois se dão conta dos seus sentimentos
はなれて通うふたりの気持ち

REGULAR.description:
Kagura, a wind-using demon, used rumors of Shikon Jewel shards to draw out demon wolf tribe members and kill them. She lures Inuyasha and the gang out and attacks them with the corpses of the demon wolf tribe members.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Contraint de se battre à mort
Trapped In a Duel To The Death!
Um plano ardiloso; A luta de vida ou morte

REGULAR.description:
At the end of a desperate struggle, Koga corners Inuyasha, but he is extremely weakened by the poisonous shard in his arm. Kagura appears and controls the wind in the battlefield. Inuyasha stands up, but she tosses him about.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A armadilha de Kagura, a mestra dos ventos
Kagura el espíritu de los vientos
Le piège mortel de Kagura, la sorcière du vent
The Deadly Trap of the Wind Sorceress, Kagura
風使い神楽の妖艶なる罠

REGULAR.description:
Miroku is reunited with Koharu, a girl he once made advances on. He leaves her in a certain village, where Kanna, the older sister of Kagura, appears. Kanna steals Koharu`s soul with a soul-sucking mirror, and Koharu is manipulated along with the villagers into attacking Inuyasha and the others.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A dança de Kagura e o espelho de Kanna
Danse de Kagura, le miroir de Kanna
Kagura no Mai to Kanna no Kagami
La danza de Kagura y el espejo de Kanna

REGULAR.description:
Kanna`s mirror fails to absorb Kagome`s soul, probably because of its size, but it reflects Inuyasha`s Wind Scar, the Tetsusaiga`s special technique. Inuyasha is injured by the blast of wind blasted back at him. Then Naraku appears.
Source: crunchyroll

Kikyo gave the sacred jewel shards she had stolen from Kagome to Naraku. She appears before Inuyasha and tells him not to kill her until she is wiped out along with the Shikon Jewel and Naraku.
Source: crunchyroll

Totosai repairs the Tetsusaiga using one of Inuyasha`s fangs. Meanwhile, Sessomaru takes the fangs of the deceased Goshinki to swordsmith Kaijinbo. He brings the fangs back to life with the Tenseiga.
Source: crunchyroll

Kaijinbo the swordsmith, manipulated by the sword Tokijin, charges at Inuyasha. In the end, he is wiped out by the force of the Tetsusaiga. All that is left is the Tokijin, which is untouchable because of the evil energy it emits.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 殺生丸, 闘鬼神を振るう

REGULAR.description:
Naraku`s new minions, Juromaru and Kageromaru, attack Inuyasha and the gang. Koga comes to save Kagome from danger. He fights the two demons as he bickers with Inuyasha, but he struggles against Kageromaru, who digs underground.
Source: crunchyroll

Because of the incident with Koga, Kagome has a fight with Inuyasha and goes back to the present day. Meanwhile, Naraku wants to get rid of Onigumo`s feelings for Kikyo by sending a giant Shinidamachu to kill Kikyo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le cœur d`Onigumo continue de battre en Naraku
Naraku ni Nokoru Onigumo no Kokoro
O coração de Onigumo ainda vive em Naraku
Onigumo`s Heart Still Beats Within Naraku
奈落に残る鬼蜘蛛の心

REGULAR.description:
Kagome returns to the present day. She senses that Inuyasha has chosen Kikyo and wonders if she can ever go back to the past, but she still has the Shikon Jewel shards. She decides to give them back and put everything to an end, until she remembers her first meeting with Inuyasha when she stands before the Sacred Tree in the present day.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Ort, an dem wir uns trafen
El lugar en donde nos conocimos
Quero voltar ao lugar onde nos conhecemos.
Retour au lieu de notre première rencontre !
Return to the Place Where We First Met
出会った場所に帰りたい!

REGULAR.description:
Sango finds the bodies of her father and the other slayers at the ruins of Naraku`s castle. Her brother Kohaku is nearby but can only remember that he escaped the castle.
Source: crunchyroll

Sango`s brother Kohaku is being manipulated by Naraku and is after Kagome`s life. Inuyasha and the gang have been separated from Kagome, but Kohaku doesn`t take Kagome`s life. Sango rushes over and tries to kill Kohaku and herself in order to free him from Naraku`s control, but Inuyasha stops her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ano Kao ga Kokoro kara Kienai
O rosto que não sai do meu coração
あの顔が心から消えない

REGULAR.description:
Just as Inuyasha and the gang overcome Naraku`s trap involving Kohaku, Sesshomaru, who is investigating the secrets of Inuyasha`s transformation, is visiting Bokusenno, a demon tree whose wood was used to make the sheaths for the Tetsusaiga and the Tenseiga.
Source: crunchyroll

Inuyasha transforms into a demon when his life is in danger. He quickly destorys Gatenmaru, who has become a giant moth. He attacks the escaping bandits with his claws, and he cannot hear Kagome trying to stop him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A verdadeira natureza do youkai não pode ser reprimida
El instinto de bestia no se detiene
止められない! 妖怪の本性

REGULAR.description:
Inuyasha visits Totosai`s workplace by himself. The Tetsusaiga was broken by Goshinki, and Inuyasha`s own fang was used to repair it. Inuyasha`s fang isn`t compatible with that of his great demon father, so the Tetsusaiga has become heavier.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El enemigo de mi padre: el Espíritu Dragón
O inimigo mortal do meu pai: Ryoukossei

REGULAR.description:
Ryukotsusei knocks away the Tetsusaiga, and Inuyasha transforms into a demon. Totosai tells everyone to retreat because they are in danger, but Kagome decides to stay behind.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La técnica secreta de Colmillo de Acero, Bakuryuha
Onda Explosiva: o ataque supremo da Tessaiga
The Backlash Wave: Tetsusaiga`s Ultimate Technique

REGULAR.description:
In a certain village, Shippo meets a girl named Satsuki. Satsuki believes that her brother, who went to war, will come back. She shows Shippo the treasure her brother gave her, a sacred jewel shard. Unfortunately, it is only a flower made of stone.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A flor de pedra e o primeiro amor de Shippou
Ishi no Hana to Shippou no Hatsukoi
The Stone Flower and Shippo`s First Love

REGULAR.description:
Husbands are being lured away from their village by a beautiful demon. Their wives ask Miroku to defeat the demon. Worried about him, Sango accompanies him. But Sango is separated from him by an odd mist.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A armadilha da bela princesa na névoa
Kiri no Oku ni Bijo no Yuuwaku
La invitación misteriosa de una princesa

REGULAR.description:
Sango goes back to the slayer village in order to fix her Hiraikotsu, and Kagome goes back to the well so she can return to the present day. Along the way, she finds a Nimenka, a fruit that looks like a face.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Fateful Night in Togenkyo, Part I
Subete wa Tougenkyou no Yoru ni (Zenpen)
Tudo o que aconteceu na noite em Tougenkyou (Parte 1)
Una noche en un paraíso extraño (1º parte)
すべては桃源郷の夜に (前編)

REGULAR.description:
Tokajin kidnaps Kagome from his miniature garden. Inuyasha is able to escape from the miniature garden with the help of Miroku and the others, and goes to save Kagome. As he escapes, he finds a flower with an old sage`s face on it.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Fateful Night in Togenkyo, Part II
Subete wa Tougenkyou no Yoru ni (Kouhen)
Tudo o que aconteceu na noite em Tougenkyou (Parte 2)
Una noche en un paraíso extraño (2º parte)
すべては桃源郷の夜に (後編)

REGULAR.description:
Sango returns to the demon slayer village and repairs her Hiraikotsu. She also lays her father and her comrades` ashes to rest. When she is about to leave, she is attacked.
Source: hulu

titles.title: 美少女姉妹の弟子入り志願

REGULAR.description:
Naraku calls upon a priestess named Tsubaki. Fifty years ago, Tsubaki was defeated by Kikyo when she went after the Shikon Jewel. She is a dark priestess who sold her soul to a demon to maintain her youth and is now after Kagome`s blood.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A sacerdotisa das sombras; Uma maldição de 50 anos
Kuro Miko Go-Juu Nen no Noroi
The 50 Year-Old Curse of the Dark Priestess

REGULAR.description:
Kagome desperately fights the curse placed on her by Tsubaki, a dark priestess. Meanwhile, Kikyo appears before Tsubaki. Tsubaki is surprised and cuts off her curse.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Kikyou aparece!; O uso do Shikigami
現れた桔梗と式神使い

REGULAR.description:
Tsubaki`s curse steals Kagome`s consciousness. Kagome forgets feudal Japan in an illusory world.
Source: hulu

Tsubaki visits the onmyoji mansion where she once trained. She plans to open a forbidden door in order to train an ogre that was sealed away in the pagoda with the power of the Shikon Jewel.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A sacerdotisa azul e a sacerdotisa vermelha que bloqueiam o caminho
行く手を阻む紅白巫女

REGULAR.description:
Tsubaki is a priestess who was considered to be on par with Kikyo. She was jealous that the Shikon Jewel was not entrusted to her, so she became a dark priestess.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Giant Ogre of the Forbidden Tower
Tahou, o youkai gigante da torre!

REGULAR.description:
One night, someone possesses Sango to attack Miroku. The group examines the centipede demon that they suspect was behind it, but they are mistaken. Miroku is possessed next and attacks Sango. Shippo tries to flee, but is cornered by a small shadow.
Source: hulu

There is a rift in Naraku`s barrier. But it`s the beginning of the month, and when night falls, Inuyasha loses his demon powers, and the search for Naraku is called off.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A barreira de Naraku; A decisão de Kagura
Naraku no Kekkai Kagura no Kesshin
奈落の結界神楽の決心

REGULAR.description:
Kagura approaches Sesshomaru and tells him to kill Naraku, but Sesshomaru refuses. As Inuyasha and the others search for Kagura, they realize that Naraku is a half demon.
Source: hulu

titles.title: El viento de la traición se desata
吹き荒れる裏切りの風

REGULAR.description:
Shippo is sent a letter challenging him to a battle. The letter`s sender is Soten Raijyu, and he is still just a child. He investigated Inuyasha and the others and determined that they were too strong, so he focuses his attention on Shippo.
Source: hulu

A demon born from a piece of flesh that Naraku discarded transforms into a man without a face and steals the handsome face of Muso, a traveling monk. The demon calls himself Muso and slaughters and plunders along his way to Kaede`s village.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Kao no Nai Otoko no Kyoufu

REGULAR.description:
Muso attacks Kagome. Inuyasha destroys him with his Wind Scar. Naraku, who was watching the event, tells Kagura to tell Inuyasha where Muso went. After Inuyasha and the others leave, Muso regenerates.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Los recuerdos de Onigumo son recuperados
よみがえった鬼蜘蛛の記憶

REGULAR.description:
Muso regenerates even thought he was hit with the Wind Scar. Miroku tells Inuyasha that Muso has a heart in the area where he has a spider marking. But Kagura interferes, and the hell wasps take away Muso`s shard.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A batalha dos três até à morte

REGULAR.description:
Inuyasha visits Totosai in search of a technique that can break through Naraku`s barrier. There he meets Bunza, a wildcat-demon child. The two do as Totosai orders them. Bunza acts as if he`s the older disciple, but ends up collapsing.
Source: hulu

Myoga comes to deliver a message from Totosai. He says that the Tetsusaiga will become stronger if it cuts a Hyakki Bat, a demon that can create a powerful barrier. Inuyasha and the gang search for the Hyakki Bats` nest, which is near the sea.
Source: hulu

Shiori Oyako to Aitsu no Kimochi
紫織母子とアイツの気持ち

REGULAR.description:
The Hyakki Bat demon Otakemaru tries to destroy the village along with Shiori`s mother. Inuyasha is blocked by Shiori`s barrier and cannot defeat Otakemaru. Shizu asks Otakemaru to respect the will of her late husband, Tsukuyomaru, and save the village.
Source: hulu

Colmillo de Acero destruye el campo de energía
The Red Tetsusaiga Breaks the Barrier!

The Panther Tribe attacks from the west. Their goal is to get the Shikon Jewel shards that Kagome has, as well as to get revenge on Sesshomaru and Inuyasha, the sons of the Dog General. The Four Panther Divas use unusual techniques and kidnap Kagome…

REGULAR.description:
Inuyasha slices through the Panthers` barrier with his red Tetsusaiga, and Inuyasha and Koga make their way into the castle town. Meanwhile, Miroku and Sango have fallen under the Divas` spell, and Kagome is being held in a prison.

The Panther King, the general of the Panther Tribe, begins to move with the power of the Shikon Jewel. Inuyasha and Sesshomaru attack the mummy. As they do, Koga, Miroku, and the others lead Kagome and the other people to a safe location.
Source: hulu

豹猫族とふたつの牙の剣

Sango is asked to slay a demon by a young lord named Kuranosuke, who fell in love with her six years ago. Kuranosuke has looks, status, and wealth. Sango is confused as to how she will turn down his marriage proposal.
Source: hulu

titles.title: 珊瑚目指してオンリーユー

The Tetsusaiga is equipped with a technique that can break through barriers. Jaken plans to steal it from Inuyasha, but his plans continually fail.

Naraku is trying to absorb Sesshomaru so that he can get the powers of a complete demon. But Inuyasha breaks through his barrier and interferes. When Naraku sees that the tables have been turned, he retreats behind his miasma.
Source: hulu

Kagome returns to the present day. She is busy preparing for a mock exam two days later. Meanwhile, Sango is concerned about Kohaku, who was taken away by Kagura.
Source: hulu

Conexión de la época actual con la antigua

Ayame, a female demon wolf, appears before Koga and tells him that she is his fiancée. But Koga is madly in love with Kagome. He runs away. Koga stops by at Naraku`s castle. Ayame goes after him, and is attacked by a hair monster there.
Source: hulu

The Female Wolf-Demon and the Lunar Rainbow Promise
女妖狼族と月虹の約束

Ayame brought Koga to stop her comrades` fighting. But she has no intention of returning to Koga. The monster that was after the Sacred Jewel shards then attacks. Koga fights to protect Kagome and Ayame.

Inuyasha fights the lord of Ogre Castle. Sanfo hears that Miroku has gone to the basement with the princess, and goes after him with the old purifier. Kagome finds the corpse of the real princess in the lord`s bedroom.

Kagome`s younger brother, Sota, has fallen in love. He has fallen in love with Hitomi, one of his classmates. At first, he asks Inuyasha for manly advice, but in the end, he decides to tell her he loves her with a plan orchestrated by Kagome.

Tesso, a mouse demon who is afraid of cats, transforms into a faith healer, and chases out Kuroro, a Nekomata who is bothering him. Inuyasha and his gang come across villagers who mistake Kirara for Kuroro and try to chase her out.

Inuyasha and the gang meet Izumo, who is investigating the secret of the creation of the Sacred Jewel. They hear that a demon has appeared, and go to investigate a nearby village.

Naraku`s poisonous bugs appear. Sesshomaru goes after them. Meanwhile, Jaken is stung by a poisonous bug and is dying. Rin is left with him. She tries to save him. She heads to Jinenji`s field to get a fruit of the Sennenso.

Kirara disappears. Sango is worried. Shippo deduces Kirara`s reasons for disappearing. He blames Inuyasha and the others, and urges them to be repentant. At that moment, a thundering sound comes from the forest. Inuyasha and the others rush on over.

Snow is falling out of season. Miroku is abducted by Koyuki, a mysterious woman. Kagome and the others hear from a hunter and his wife about a snow demon. When they go looking for him, they find Sango, who had gotten lost.

Kagome, Miroku, and Sango have been weakened by Mukotsu`s poison. Inuyasha is tries to draw attacks away from them as he fights Ginkotsu of the Band of Seven.

かごめ, 弥勒, 珊瑚, 絶体絶命

初めてみせる犬夜叉の涙

Mt. Hakurei`s holy barrier prevents demons from entering it. Saint Hakushin helped Naraku, and placed the barrier. Koga tries to find a way to beak through, but fails.

titles.title: A mais perigosa confissão de Miroku
La peligrosa confesión del monje Miroku
Miroku Houshi no Motto mo Kiken na Kokuhaku
弥勒法師のもっとも危険な告白

REGULAR.description:
Sara, a mysterious woman, appears before Sara. Sara was once saved by Sesshomaru. She was reincarnated just as she had died from an illness. She has stolen Inuyasha`s Tessaiga, and turned Miroku and Sango into glass statues.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Die Frau, die Sesshoumaru liebte – Teil 1
La mujer que se enamora de Sesshōmaru (1º parte)
The Woman Who Loved Sesshoumaru, Part 1
殺生丸を愛した女 (前編)

REGULAR.description:
Sara, a mysterious woman, appears before Sara. Sara was once saved by Sesshomaru. She was reincarnated just as she had died from an illness. She has stolen Inuyasha`s Tessaiga, and turned Miroku and Sango into glass statues.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Die Frau, die Sesshoumaru liebte – Teil 2
La mujer que se enamora de Sesshōmaru (2º parte)
The Woman Who Loved Sesshoumaru, Part 2
殺生丸を愛した女 (後編)

REGULAR.description:
Priest Mushin, the person who raised Miroku, is going to die. Miroku and the others are shocked. They ask to Mushin`s what he wants so that they can give him one last gift.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ein letztes Festmahl für Mirokus Meister
El último banquete del maestro Moushin
Miroku no Shishou Saigo no Utage
O último banquete do mestre de Miroku
The Last Banquet of Miroku`s Master
弥勒の師匠 最後の宴

REGULAR.description:
A treasure stealing invisible demon appears. An old lady who failed to defeat him asks Inuyasha and the gang for help. Inuyasha is in charge of guarding the second biggest mansion in town.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ein mysteriöser, unsichtbarer Dämon taucht auf!
Un monstruo invisible, lo ves o no lo ves
怪奇透明妖怪現る現る!

REGULAR.description:
Akitoki, Hoji`s ancestor is on a journey to offer the Hojo family heirloom, the Kenkon Naginata, a demon sword that brings disaster. Inuyasha and the gang travel accompany him. People who are after the Kenkon Naginata appear.
Source: hulu

titles.title: El nombre de mi antepasado era Aome Hoyo
O nome da ancestral é Kagome

REGULAR.description:
The Ken blade brings disaster. Akitoki and Inuyasha travel the shrine of the wind and thunder gods to make an offering to seal away the blade`s demon powers. But Hoshiyomi`s demon ninjas attack in order to steal the blade.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A Sobrevivência numa terra infestada de youkais
Der Berg der Dämonen – Kagomes & Akitokis Überlebenskampf
Mountain of Demons - Survival of the Duo
妖怪山河 ふたりのサバイバル
El gran duelo en la cascada Shoun
O grande duelo na cascata Shohun
The Great Duel at Shoun Falls!

REGULAR.description:
Tsukiyomi, who is supposed to be dead, possesses Kagome and appears before Hoshiyomi.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Eien no Omoi Kenkon no Naginata
Eternal Love - The Naginata of Kenkon
Ewige Liebe – Die Naginata von Himmel und Erde
永遠の想い 乾坤の薙刀
A libertação do monstruoso cavalo youkai Entei
解き放たれた妖馬炎蹄

REGULAR.description:
Naraku`s baby was split into two. One half comes back to life in the form of a child dressed in white.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Bousou Entei to Senritsu no Hakudoushi
Der zerstörerische Entei und der schauderhafte Hakudoushi
暴走炎蹄と戦慄の白童子

REGULAR.description:
Kanta is an otter demon child. His father`s head was taken by Hakudoshi, and he is looking for his father`s body.
Source: hulu

titles.title: 3.000 Meilen auf der Suche nach Vater
3000 leguas de viaje en busca de mi Padre
A viagem em busca do pai

REGULAR.description:
The area between this world and the next, where Sacred Jewel shard is, is the demon graveyard where Inuyasha`s father`s corpse rests.
Source: hulu

titles.title: 宝仙鬼と最後のかけら

REGULAR.description:
Inuyasha and the gang arrive in the land of fire. They discover a giant gateway within a cave in the mountains.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Anoyo to no Sakai ni Iyou na Monban
Bizarre Guards at the Border of the Afterlife
Die sonderbaren Torwächter an der Grenze zum Jenseits
あの世との境に異様な門番

REGULAR.description:
When the gateway in the Land of Fire opened, Kagome sensed the presence of the Sacred Jewel shard.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Abi, a incontrolável dominadora de aves
The Fiery Bird Master, Princess Abi
気性荒い鳥使い 阿毘姫

REGULAR.description:
When Kikyo`s younger sister, Kaede, was still a little girl, Kikyo entrusted her with a corrupt Sacred Jewel, which was removed from the body of the Mistress centipede.
Source: hulu

REGULAR.description:
In order to defeat Naraku, Kagura looks for Sesshomaru. She appears before Rin and Jaken, but Sesshomaru is away.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Haran o Yobu Ippon no Ya

REGULAR.description:
Kagome and the others sense Kikyo`s presence from the purifying arrow. Meanwhile, Abihime attacks the village.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A luz que guia à um santo
Las luces que guían a su eminencia
Seija o Michibiku Fushigi na Hikari
The Mysterious Light that Guides the Saint
聖者を導く不思議な光

REGULAR.description:
The other half of Hakudoshi, Naraku`s baby, is being hidden in a human castle by Kanna.
Source: hulu

titles.title: かごめ 本能の選択

REGULAR.description:
Abihime and Tekkei sense that people keep interfering with them ever since they became involved with Naraku.
Source: hulu

Abihime dislikes Naraku, and has attacked a castle belonging to humans inolved with Naraku.
Source: hulu

titles.title: El destino es una cruel reunión

REGULAR.description:
Kikyo is reunited with Inuyasha.

Der Dämon, der mit dem Jenseits verbunden ist

あの世とつながる妖怪

REGULAR.description:
Naraku has cut off Tekkei`s head. He heads to the place between this world and the next on the river of blood that comes gushing out.

O youkai que protege o fragmento
Shikon no Kakera o Mamoru Oni

Kagura leads Sesshomaru to the Land of Fire.

titles.title: Entscheidungskampf am Grab! Sesshoumaru vs. Inuyasha
The Final Battle at the Graveside: Sesshomaru Versus Inuyasha!
墓前決戦! 殺生丸vs犬夜叉

REGULAR.description:
Naraku hs stolen the final shard from Hosenki. Hosenki tells Inuyasha to kill him. Inuyasha`s Tessaiga gains the demon powers of any powerful demon it cuts.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Destroy Naraku with the Adamant Barrage!

REGULAR.description:
Hakudoshi releases a swarm of Zushi Rats into a field in order to lure Kikyo out.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Dai Bousou Musuu no Youkai Nezumi
Stampede of the Countless Demon Rats!
大暴走無数の妖怪ネズミ

REGULAR.description:
In order to reach Naraku`s heart and get his revenge, Kohaku cannot defy Naraku.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Kohaku no Ketsui to Sango no Kokoro
琥珀の決意と珊瑚の心

REGULAR.description:
Inuyasha tells Kaede that Kikyo is still alive. Kagome is depressed that Inuyasha still has feelings for Kikyo.
Source: hulu

Miroku cured a girl named Shima of a disease two years ago. She is reunited with Miroku and asks him for help.

Children have been kidnapped, and a group of priests led by Ungai, a powerful priest who hates demons, go after the demon who did it.
